a shameful thing that almost taboo. They find themselves guilty of not being able to live up to the traditional role of a husband and father. It is a mental anguish for them to impose such a thing upon them and their loved ones. It shatters their livelihood and something that they can barely tolerate.

Al- hamdulilah, there do exist certain young people who are active in helping reform the minds and hearts of Muslims. They are the reason why we have this change and where our Hijabis ski

they are trying to protect their beliefs and sacrifice everything for the sake of their religion and upbringing of their family.

"These Khadis are taking abuse from their husbands and they are still trying to protect their beliefs and sacrifice everything for the sake of their religion and upbringing of their family." Madina Shaik Abdullah said

Why do these women deserve our respect and recognition?

Take the first example of Khadi Sona Devi. She was born into a Hindu family but she changed her religion to Islam. She got a divorce and managed to live in Nepal till she died. Nowadays , Nepal is a tolerant society so she wasn't treated differently.

Conclusion

Smje believes that living in a sacred land holds greater responsibilities considering its moral and social culture and intellectual essence. Life in secular countries weaken the foundations of islam and the foundation of islamic culture as a whole .
